TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RayMeshGeometry3DHitTestResult extends System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RayHitTestResult

Docs.summary: Represents an intersection between a ray hit test and a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class returns information about the intersection of a ray and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D>.
Barycentric coordinates returned by <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RayMeshGeometry3DHitTestResult.VertexWeight1%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RayMeshGeometry3DHitTestResult.VertexWeight2%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RayMeshGeometry3DHitTestResult.VertexWeight3%2A> can be interpolated to find the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> where the intersection occurred, or the point on the intersected model's texture using texture coordinates.

Docs.summary: Gets the distance between the point of intersection and the ray's origin in the coordinate space of which initiated the hit test.
Docs.value: Double that indicates the distance between the point of intersection and the ray's origin in the coordinate space of which initiated the hit test.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code excerpt reads this property.
[!code-vb[hittest3d#HitTest3D3DN7](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/hittest3d/window1.xaml.vb#hittest3d3dn7)] [!code-cs[hittest3d#HitTest3D3DN7](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/HitTest3D/Window1.xaml.cs#hittest3d3dn7)]

Docs.summary: Gets the intersected by this hit test.
Gets the point at which the mesh was intersected by the ray along which the hit test was performed.
Docs.value: Point3D at which the mesh was intersected.

Docs.summary: First vertex of the mesh triangle intersected by the ray.
Docs.value: The index of the first vertex.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property provides the index position of the vertex in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.Positions%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.Normals%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.TextureCoordinates%2A> collections of the mesh triangle intersected.

Docs.summary: Second vertex of the mesh triangle intersected by the ray.
Docs.value: The index of the second vertex.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property provides the index position of the vertex in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.Positions%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.Normals%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.TextureCoordinates%2A> collections of the mesh triangle intersected.

Docs.summary: Third vertex of the mesh triangle intersected by the ray.
Docs.value: The index of the third vertex.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property provides the index position of the vertex in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.Positions%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.Normals%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.TextureCoordinates%2A> collections of the mesh triangle intersected.

Docs.summary: Relative contribution of the first vertex of a mesh triangle to the point at which that triangle was intersected by the hit test, expressed as a value between zero and 1.
Docs.value: The weighting of the first vertex.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property is the first of the mesh triangle's barycentric coordinates.

Docs.summary: Relative contribution of the second vertex of a mesh triangle to the point at which that triangle was intersected by the hit test, expressed as a value between zero and 1.
Docs.value: The weighting of the second vertex.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property is the second of the mesh triangle's barycentric coordinates.

Docs.summary: Relative contribution of the third vertex of a mesh triangle to the point at which that triangle was intersected by the hit test, expressed as a value between zero and 1.
Docs.value: The weighting of the third vertex.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property is the third of the mesh triangle's barycentric coordinates.
